thread.section_title: Travel news, tips and features - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Rick Steves: Discoveries in Florence
thread.title_full: Rick Steves: Discoveries in Florence - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rick Steves
title: Rick Steves: Discoveries in Florence
text: Geographically small but culturally rich, Florence is home to some of the greatest art and architecture in the world. I’ve been there more times than I can count, and with each visit, I’m reminded that I’ve barely scratched the surface of all it has to offer.
